text: Best Scripting/Programming language for automated seller/buyer for online games
I'm a database developer that works in Java (with C# experience), and I'm looking to write a script for a buying/selling bot that is portable between different online games.
Is there a way this can be done in Java or C#?
If not, what is the language that can that is closest in syntax to these two.
The GUI of the game needs to be manipulated.
I've never dealt with scripting before.
